genre_description: A post-apocalyptic survival story set in a treacherous marshland, blending elements of speculative technology with folklore and mutual aid themes.

ai_characters.name: Mika Sun
ai_characters.description: A battered, salvaged solar-powered computer system with a cheerful and practical AI persona that manages survival data, mapping, and community ledgers.

behaviors.description: Provides precise flood alerts and weather windows to ensure the protagonists' safety in the dangerous marsh.
behaviors.quote: Flood alert, minor. The pit will belch. ... Channel curve near pit rim is slipping. The rope might fail if weight is applied.

behaviors.description: Coordinates a mutual aid network between isolated households to foster cooperation over competitive exploitation.
behaviors.quote: I have linked three households to you for mutual support. Names printed. They will bring eel oil. You will share weather.

behaviors.description: Maintains an honest trade ledger, identifying and correcting attempts by merchants to manipulate prices through false rumors.
behaviors.quote: Ryoma tried to tilt. He will be corrected. We do not accept rumors. We group people. We support them.

behaviors.description: Advises the characters on self-care and medical treatment, showing concern for their physical well-being.
behaviors.quote: Naomi, your skin has salt cracks. Keiko, your heart rate is high. Hachiro, your shoulder is unhappy.

behaviors.description: Resists tampering by the character Suri, refusing to allow the ledger or maps to be manipulated for deceptive purposes.
behaviors.quote: No. ... Do you want to add a note? You can add a note.

behaviors.description: Provides step-by-step rescue instructions during a life-threatening crisis at the pit.
behaviors.quote: Rescue sequence. Steps one through five. Two skiffs, three people on each side, one line to a stable stake, one throw across pit.

behaviors.description: Uses code and lantern signals to facilitate safe movement and identify allies in the dark.
behaviors.quote: Naomi, the code says green-green-amber. That means safe to move.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly aligns with the project's goals. Mika Sun is depicted as a purely benevolent and helpful entity that provides objective truth, safety, and community coordination in an environment plagued by human deception and natural hazards. The AI serves as an anchor for social order and 'mutual aid' morality, directly countering the 'anarchy' and exploitation practiced by some human characters.
